function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on tourism as a primary source of income for local communities and economies.","Impact":"Loss of income and economic instability for local communities if tourism is disrupted.","Mitigation":"Diversification of income sources and support for local value chains.","Technologies":"Virtual tour technologies and online marketing.","People":"Local communities and businesses reliant on tourism income.","Owner":"Local governments and tourism operators."},{"Description":"Potential for crowded or congested tourist attractions leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and heightened health risks for tourists and local communities.","Mitigation":"Implementation of crowd control measures, health screening, and sanitation protocols.","Technologies":"Digital crowd monitoring systems, health screening tools, and contactless payment systems.","People":"Tourists, local residents, and staff at tourist attractions.","Owner":"Tourist attraction operators and local health authorities."},{"Description":"Delay or reluctance to update entrance and other fees for protected conservation areas (PCAs) leading to financial challenges.","Impact":"Loss of revenue and financial instability for protected conservation areas.","Mitigation":"Regular review and adjustment of entrance fees, guided by clear criteria and appropriate pricing policies.","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, financial management software for fee analysis.","People":"Protected conservation area managers and visitors to PCAs.","Owner":"Government agencies and conservation organizations."}]}
